title: LF Serious Mid Laner R5s
body:
Hey Guys,
Looking for a serious mid laner for ranked 5s (Solo or Feed), we are currently Plat 3, and we are looking to recruit an experienced mature mid laner that will be active.

Requirements:
- Plat 3+ Soloq
- Mic (skype),

If you would like to join, flick me a message on League of Legends, my summoner name is Le Flays.

Regards,
Solo or Feed

replies.body: When Are you free for me to try out?

> [{quoted}](name=SeethingSin,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=7EK2Et8l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-15T23:32:20.960+0000)
>
> When Are you free for me to try out?

Hey dude,
Which Timezone are you in? NZ/AU, just flick me a message on league, and we will sort you out!
